abstract: Facebook‘s chief executive, Mark Zuckerberg, after a board-level conversation, has declined a funding offer that would value the social network firm at $4 billion, VentureBeat reported.
lead_paragraph: Facebook‘s chief executive, Mark Zuckerberg, after a board-level conversation, has declined a funding offer that would value the social network firm at $4 billion, VentureBeat reported.

headline.main: Facebook Said to Reject Funding Offer
